title: PBL-CBT Integrated Instructional Design for Ultrasound Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ultrasound equipment operation and medical terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment combining VR simulations and real-case analysis for skill-based training targeting in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish normal/abnormal findings in ultrasound images (sonograms) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can design three ultrasound protocols required for differential diagnosis in given clinical cases.
Learners can perform standard ultrasound examination procedures in a VR simulation environment with 90% completion rate.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
